sentence: congress has given the federal reserve three monetary policy objectives: maximum employment, stable prices and moderate long-term interest rates.

sentence: we have viewed these objectives as congruent with a goal of maximum sustainable growth that can occur only in the context of long-run price stability.

sentence: but faster productivity growth, despite its long-term benefits, has not insulated the economy from cyclical swings.

sentence: in response, the federal reserve made substantial adjustments to its policy interest rate in order to cushion the effects of these developments on the broader economy.

sentence: other forces--particularly the growing interconnectedness of the global economy--have been important background factors in setting monetary policy.
